summary: Collects several gambeson-style armors, from my other mods
descriptionHtml:
Nernie\'s Armor Pack - v1.01

changelog:
Version 1.01 August 26 2012
-fixes some incorrect recipes for cowls and hoods


-This pack provides the gambeson-style armor and robes and hoods from my other mods, Nernie\'s Ranger Pack and Nernie\'s Thief Pack. 

-It also adds one extra item, The Robes of the Mountain Witch. This armor is for both genders, but only the female version has the fur cape and extra pouches (because of Nifskope limitations - my intentions were good!). This piece has only been tested by me, so please let me know if it functions strangely for you - it might be one that I remove, if it\'s unstable for too many people.

-All of these items are craftable, and the armor is upgradeable. So far, I haven\'t added them to any leveled lists.

-I can\'t think of any reason why you couldn\'t use both this mod, and the Ranger and Thief packs. The items won\'t stack, but that should be it.

-This mod has been quickly cobbled together by request, and hasn\'t undergone the usual weeks of personal testing that I like to employ. It\'s simple, so there should be no major issues (I hope), but please let me know if I missed anything that needs fixing.

Installation: Drop all files into the Data folder, or install with Nexus Mod Manager.

Russian Version:
http://modgames.net/load/249-1-0-13599
author: Nernie
